name: Army Relief, Narrative Scenario
description:
A "choose your own adventure"-esc game I wrote during my Work Experience at Rheinmetall in Australia. 

You play as a Captain who's in a foreign country and is in charge of helping out relief efforts after a landslide just damaged a town. Complications arise when one family refuses to evacuate with the rest of the people. It's your job to make choices and try to help the family to the best of your abilities.

It has a branching story line and multiple endings. Some good, some bad, and some in a grey area.
